_comments.project_dir: Main directory for storing datasets and model weights. Update this to your cluster path.
_comments.output_dir: Directory where generated datasets will be saved (relative to project root)
_comments.cache_dirs: Cache directories for HuggingFace models/datasets and PyTorch. ${PROJECT_DIR} will be replaced with project_dir value
_comments.model_config: Configuration for the generator model used to create synthetic data
_comments.generation_config: Number of examples to generate for each attack category
